title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5014.1 - Options available to members at retirement-general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5014.1 - Options available to members at retirement-general

State Regulations
A member may elect at retirement, in lieu of the maximum
benefit, one of the following options, as applicable: Lump sum option

Declining reserve (tier 1 members only)

Annuity reserve (tier 1 and 2 members only)

Guarantee option
5-year
10-year

Alternative option (tier 1, 2, 4 and 5 members only)

Alternative option (tier 3 members only)

Survivor option
100%
75%
50%
25%
Pop-up option
100%
75% (tier 1, 2, 4 and 5 members only)
50%
25% (tier 1, 2, 4 and 5 members only)

Each option is defined in section
5014.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5014.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
